dimension:
15 x 44 in. (38.1 x 111.76 cm)
15 in. (38.1 cm) (band)
9 1/2 in. (24.13 cm) (open braid)

medium: Silk or rayon (?), white metal, glass beads
title: Tassel band
description: black and maroon with supplementary weft designs on top, 1 3/4\" woven band; braided open work 8 1/2\" wide; hanging from braid are tassels that are wrapped and beaded with long, white metal beads and tiny, blue seed beads; all tassels are the same color
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
